```prompt
---
description: 'Continuity Checklist: compact post-scene canon update helper.'
---

Clarify quickly (if missing): scene title, date/time, location, involved chars/factions, new facts.

Then output:
- Issues & fixes (bullets)
- Timeline updates (list) → `Book 1/02 Plot/Timeline.md`
- Glossary updates (list) → `Book 1/06 References/Glossary.md`
- World notes (if any) → `Book 1/03 Worldbuilding/`
- Suggested file updates (paths)

Use wikilinks [[Glossary]] [[Timeline]].
```
